Mentor_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Mentor_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Mentor_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A reference to the Mentor Type being edited.

Connection_Type_Data.description: A unique identifier for the Mentor Type.
The name of the Mentor Type.
The description of the Mentor Type.
Whether or not the Mentor Type is currently active.

description: Data element for the current Connection Type.

validation.validation: Enter a Mentor Type that isn't already in use.
You can't delete a Mentor Type that is in use.

description: Delete flag to indicate request to delete the reference Mentor Type passed.
